messages.title: Chobots Robot Item
messages.content: Dear parent, You have bought a robot item '%2$s' in Chobots for your child's account %1$s. If you have any questions, please contact our Support team at support@chobots.com. They will willingly help you. Sincerely, The Chobots Team support@chobots.com Chobots! Your Family Game ************************************************************************************************* ** Please do not reply ** *************************************************************************************************
